Witamy na naszej stronie, gdzie możesz ł: Welcome to our site, where you can easily access the most up-to-date information on air quality in your region. Our goal is to make air quality monitoring as convenient and efficient as possible for you.
Wybór kraju: Aby wybrać kraj, wystarczy: Country selection: To select a country, simply double-click the desired country on the map.
Cofanie działań: Aby cofnąć działania, w: To undo actions, simply click once on an empty spot on the map.
Wyszukiwanie miejsca: Jeśli nie możesz z: If you can't find your place on the map, you can search for it by entering the name in the top menu of the page.
Uzyskiwanie informacji: Aby uzyskać szcz: To get detailed information about the air quality in the selected region, click on the markers on the map or use the side panel.
Dołącz do naszej społeczności i bądź czę: Join our community and be part of our effort for clean air for all!
Na tej stronie internetowej podajemy inf: On this website, we provide information about air quality using the standard Air Quality Index (AQI) [μg/m³], which ranges from 0 to 500 and reflects the level of atmospheric pollution. Each pollutant, such as SO2, NO2, PM10, PM2.5, O3, and CO, has its own standards and impact on health.
Naszą misją jest dostarczanie użytkownik: Our mission is to provide users with understandable information about how each pollutant affects their health and the air quality around them. Below are the details for each pollutant, including its AQI ranges, standards, and values:
Opis: Dwutlenek siarki może powstawać w: Description: Sulfur dioxide can be produced from the burning of coal and oil.
Wpływ: Wysokie poziomy SO2 są związane z: Impact: High levels of SO2 are associated with respiratory illnesses and cardiovascular risks.
Opis: Dwutlenek azotu pochodzi głównie z: Description: Nitrogen dioxide mainly comes from emissions from vehicles and industrial sources.
Wpływ: Wysokie poziomy NO2 mogą powodowa: Impact: High levels of NO2 can cause breathing problems and irritation of the respiratory tract.
Opis: PM10 zawiera pył, dym i inne cząst: Description: PM10 includes dust, smoke, and other solid particles.
Wpływ: Te cząsteczki mogą przedostać się: Impact: These particles can enter the lungs and cause various illnesses, including asthma and cardiovascular diseases.
Opis: Cząsteczki PM2.5 są jeszcze bardzi: Description: PM2.5 particles are even more dangerous as their sizes allow them to penetrate deep into the lungs.
Wpływ: Może to prowadzić do poważnych ch: Impact: This can lead to serious respiratory diseases, including cancer and other chronic conditions.
Opis: Wysokie poziomy ozonu w atmosferze: Description: High levels of ozone in the atmosphere can cause irritation to the respiratory tract.
Wpływ: Może to pogorszyć stan osób, zwła: Impact: This can worsen the condition of individuals, especially children and people with respiratory diseases.
Opis: Tlenek węgla jest wynikiem niepełn: Description: Carbon monoxide is a result of incomplete combustion of fuel.
Wpływ: Wysokie poziomy CO mogą prowadzić: Impact: High levels of CO can lead to poisoning as it can replace oxygen in the blood.
